details.point: Develop team's competition data collection application, enhance robot capabilities with computer vision and sensor integration, contribute to SOTA team software (particle filter localizer, time-optimal trajectory optimizer, yearly robot control architecture).
Lead subteams in design, manufacturing, and programming of team robot while training new members to contribute to robot development. Attend/host 20+ STEM community outreach events.
Develop a progressive web app for TheBlueAlliance, modernizing the platform and enabling effective, real-time access for FRC competition data and insights internationally.

org: UCLA COSMOS (CA Summer School for Mathematics & Science)

details.point: Investigated machine learning advancements (attention, visual processing, recurrent systems, reinforcement, etc) alongside their neurological foundations.
Developed novel audio generation ML framework with UC funding.
Develop engaging curricula, recruit mentors, plann and effectively deliver in-person and online camps encompassing diverse STEM fields.
Impacted 700+ students and raised $6000+ to support organization costs, local STEM outreach initiatives for underrepresented communities, and children health foundations.
Refine argumentation skills and rapidly synthesize speeches to compete on an international level.
Competed in 20+ tournaments as member of 3/3550+ ranked NSDA program.
